#labels Featured
#What works and what needs to be done

== Introduction ==

This is a collection of features which are supported and what is todo.

=== This works ===
  * Reading access for RTM features: see [https://code.google.com/p/moloko/wiki/RTMAccessLevels RTMAccessLevels]   
    * lists (including smart lists)
    * tasks
    * tags
    * notes
    * locations (including Google Maps and Navigation)
    * contacts (support for linking RTM contacts to phone contacts. See [https://code.google.com/p/moloko/wiki/RTMContactLinking RTMContactLinking])

  * Writing/Deleting access for RTM features: see [https://code.google.com/p/moloko/wiki/RTMAccessLevels RTMAccessLevels]
    * Rename tasks

  * Support for Android integrated search dialog. Allows searching for tasks using smart search syntax from above with search history.<br>
  * Support for *HTTP* and *HTTPS* access of RTM including proxy settings and compression to save data volume.
  * RTM smart search syntax operators. Also used for smart lists: See [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/search/advanced.rtm RTM search syntax]
 
|| *operator* || *parameter* ||
|| list: || string ||
|| name: || string ||
|| priority: || string ||
|| status: || completed | incomplete ||
|| location: || string ||
|| isLocated: || true | false ||
|| due: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| dueAfter: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| dueBefore: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| dueWithin: || string ||
|| completed: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| completedAfter: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| completedBefore: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| completedWithin: || string ||
|| added: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| addedAfter: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| addedBefore: || [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/dateformat.rtm date] ||
|| addedWithin: || string ||
|| timeEstimate: || "(>|<)? [http://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/answers/basics/timeestimateformat.rtm time estimation]" ||
|| postponed: || string ||
|| tag: || string ||
|| tagContains: || string ||
|| isTagged: || true | false ||

|| AND, OR, NOT, (, ) || *operator* ||
